name: 225-6 sidewalk artist
notes:
**knitted beret in drops air.**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

drops design: pattern no ai-362
yarn group c or a + a

-------------------------------------------------------

**sizes**:
s/m - m/l - l/xl
fits head size: 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm

**materials**:
drops air from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group c)
50-100-100 g colour 02, wheat

needles:
drops circular needle size 4.5 mm: length 40 cm for stocking stitch.
drops circular needle size 4 mm: length 40 cm for rib.
drops double pointed needles size 4.5 mm.
the technique magic loop can be used – you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size.

**knitting tension:**
18 stitches in width and 23 rows in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm.
note: needle size is only a guide. if you get too many stitches on 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. if you get too few stitches on 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
